main.name: Dominik Skorupski
main.occupation: Front-end developer with 4+ years commercial experience
main.description: I work with technologies: JavaScript+TypeScript, React+Redux/Next.Js/Node.Js, Angular + RxJs and many other. I speak English fluently and I know German at B1+. I also worked in HR where I learned soft skills and customer service
main.bio: Before programming commercial experience I finished an intense 6-month Kodilla Front End programming course and also worked in HR industry for 5 years. Training and projects in following technologies: HTML/CSS, Git/DevTools, JavaScript/Typescript, React/Angular . I invite you to check my Fullstack project at bottom of the side with techstack: React/Redux/Nodejs/Express/Mongo/GoogleAuth/Send Emails/JavaScript and MANY more :)

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
